string.name: name
string.value: Victoria Return to Nature Rally

string.name: message
string.value: Reach the portal on the east side of Kerning City within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Octopuses and go to the eastern portal within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Orange Mushrooms and go to the eastern portal within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Reach the eastern portal leading to Ellinia within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Reach the northern portal leading to Ellinia within the time limit.

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Slimes and go to the northern portal within the time limit

string.name: message

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Slimes and go to the northern portal within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Bubblings and go to the northern portal within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Eliminate the Fairies and go to the western portal within the time limit

string.name: message
string.value: Get to Fanzy within the time limit to complete the rally
